help.title: Help
help.subtitle: Tutorial on how to use this tool

change_lang.title: Switching the language
change_lang.text: Changing the language is possible via the language dropdown in the application's menu bar. The available options are German and English.

add_row.title: Adding a row
add_row.text: A row can be added using the "+" button highlighted in yellow. button highlighted in yellow.

remove_row.title: Remove a row
remove_row.text: A row can be removed using the in black "x" button to remove it.

edit_row.title: Edit a row
edit_row.text: Editing a row is possible by clicking on the column attribute to be edited. Here, the selection of the camera type and video compression is done via a dropdown. The attributes: FPS, Hours/Day, Days and Count can be edited by entering the desired value.

csv_export.title: CSV-Export
csv_export.text: The table can be exported as CSV (Comma Separated Values) using the Export CSV button in the menu bar.

contact.title: Contact us!
contact.text: If you found a Bug, or just have a good idea for this tool. Please reach out to one of the maintainers listed below. Click on the mail-icon next to one of the email-addresses to open a new draft in your mail program.

Windowsize.title: We're sorry
Windowsize.subtitle: The window is too small for the correct display of this web page. Please reduce the zoom of the browser, or drag the window a little larger.
